description: Performs deep static analysis across multiple programming languages, leveraging Language Server Protocol (LSP) clients to extract detailed code insights such as symbols, references, and call hierarchies. It stores and manages analysis results in a cache.

components.name: LSP Client Core
components.description: The primary component responsible for orchestrating the initialization and communication with Language Server Protocols (LSPs). It manages the lifecycle of LSP sessions and coordinates requests for code insights.

components.name: LSP Communication Handler
components.description: Handles the low-level, generic communication protocol with LSP servers, sending requests and receiving raw analysis data. It abstracts the underlying communication mechanism from the higher-level LSP client logic.

components.name: LSP Adapter
components.description: Provides language-specific adaptations and configurations for LSP interactions. It translates generic LSP requests into language-specific formats and processes responses tailored to each programming language.

components.name: Language Configuration Manager
components.description: Defines, loads, and manages language-specific settings and configurations required for LSP initialization and analysis. It ensures that the correct parameters are applied for each programming language.

components.name: Project Configuration Scanner
components.description: Scans project configurations (e.g., pyproject.toml, package.json) to identify language settings, project roots, and other relevant information necessary for configuring LSP clients and initiating analysis.

components.name: Analysis Result Store
components.description: Serves as the central repository for all static analysis artifacts, including Control Flow Graphs (CFGs), class hierarchies, package dependencies, and resolved code references. It ensures the persistence and queryability of analysis outcomes.

components.name: Reference Resolver
components.description: Dedicated to resolving ambiguous or incomplete code references identified during static analysis. It employs various strategies, including direct matches, file path heuristics, and potentially querying the Analysis Result Store or LSP Communication Handler for more context.

components_relations.relation: informs about detected project languages and settings
interacts with to send and receive raw LSP messages
requests additional context from for unresolved references
